data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Li, Tao, Achterberg, Cornelis van (2017): A new species of genus Chorebus Haliday (Hymenoptera, Alysiinae) parasitising Hexomyzacaraganae Gu (Diptera, Agromyzidae) from NW China. ZooKeys 663: 145-155, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.663.11874, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.663.11874
